existing_features.title: Extend the existing admin UI to include a "Reset Published Site" action that triggers the backend reset function, using the same admin authentication gating already used on the admin page, and requiring an explicit confirmation dialog before executing.
After a successful reset, ensure the UI and client cache are fully refreshed so the lobby/admin lists reflect the empty state without requiring a manual browser refresh.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add an admin-page function to reset the entire live/published site, similar to the draft version reset workflow

Add a backend admin-only reset function that clears all published/live site data (chatrooms, messages, active users, reactions, and user profiles) and resets ID counters so the site returns to an empty/initial state.

projectName: Add admin function to reset all live/published site data
